summary: A transform that injects configurable additive noise into image channels. It supports multiple probability distributions (uniform, Gaussian, Laplace, Beta) and three spatial generation modes—single value per channel, a shared noise map for all channels, or independent per‑pixel noise—while allowing resolution approximation to trade speed for quality.
business_intent: Enable realistic and diverse noise‑based data augmentation for computer‑vision pipelines, helping models become robust to sensor imperfections, lighting variations, and other stochastic disturbances.
